answers.answer: has he been checked for diabetes?

If your child has delayed development and stunted growth (among other symptoms) I would suspect Chrones disease.However I agree with the first poster on diabetes becauseChildrens Type 1 diabetes symptoms are thirst, weight loss, tiredness, frequent urination, tummy pains, headaches and behavior problems.You listed two out of the above symptoms that your son has complaints of. Maybe he has more(?)Good Luck.GL

question: my 7 year old boy has been complaining of stomach discomfort for a few weeks and eye discomfort and thirsty he has not run fever most symptoms seem worst later on in the day Chrones disease runs in family is it possible this could be the problem at this age
title: 7 year old with abdominal discomfort, eye pain , thirsty
